title: Sanctuary of the Muses
description: The Sanctuary of the Helikonian Muses in Boeotia is celebrated by Hesiod. Archaeological remains of part of the sanctuary in the valley of the Muses date to the third and second centuries B.C.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 26106
